titles: A treatise of the canker of Englands common wealth Deuided into three parts: wherein the author imitating the rule of good phisitions, first, declareth the disease. Secondarily, sheweth the efficient cause thereof. Lastly, a remedy for the same. By Gerrard De Malynes merchant.
author: Malynes, Gerard, fl. 1586-1641.
publisher: By Richard Field for William Iohnes printer, dwelling in Red-crosse-streete in ship Allie,
notes: Running title reads: The canker of Englands common wealth.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  Commerce --  Early works to 1800.
